name: Lost in Space (itch) (thomasjiralerspong)
description:
Important: There are currently 2 bugs in the game which only happen on the build version and only on certain computers so we did not find them until just before submission. READ THE FOLLOWING TO FIGURE OUT HOW TO DEAL WITH THEM.

  1. In the build version on certain computers, if you're on the starting platform and you jump without landing on a different platform you will die immediately. If this happens make sure that your first jump always brings you to another platform than the starting one
  2. In the build version on certain computers, if you fall you will continue falling for around 10 seconds before dying. If this happens you will just have to wait a bit longer when falling before you are brought back to the start menu.

We apologize for the inconvenience but hope that if you experience these bugs you will be able to look past them to see the experience we intended.

Made with Unity for McGameJam 2022.

  • Visual assets made with Maya and Unity.
  • Platforms generated procedurally
  • Music and SFX found online

Description: Navigate through the darkness of space with only your light to guide you. Don't try to memorize the map because it is generated randomly every  time you respawn. Beware of meteors! They provide precious light so you can see where the next platforms are, but will kill you if they hit you... Try to get as far as possible from your starting point without dying while the meteors falling on you get more and more frequent.
